== Who am I? ==

I am a 31 years old student in Computer Engineering at <nowiki>[[http://www.univpm.it|Universit√† Politecnica delle Marche]]</nowiki> in Italy. My interests and hobby (outside of IT, of course) are cooking, jazz music and politic.

I started using Linux in 1995, when I found a Red''''''Hat CD within a computer magazine. Since then, I have used many different distros (Debian, SuSE, Mandrake-Mandriva, Fedora and more), until June 2006, when I installed Dapper and Ubuntu became my favourite operating system. After a few months I started helping in the Italian Lo''''''Co Team, and in October 2007 I initiated my journey in Ubuntu Development.

== Ubuntu involvement ==

=== Ubuntu Development ===

Starting October 2007, I'm now mostly involved with packaging. My former mentor <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~pitti|pitti]]</nowiki> greatly helped me facing this amazing world and up to now I took care of bugfixes, merges, syncs and brand new packaging. My fields of interest are QA, python and science. I eventually became an Ubuntu Developer in march 2008.

I am particularly interested in mentoring and sponsoring of new contributors. I served within the former Mentoring Project, and I am currently a member of the <nowiki>[[DeveloperAdvisoryTeam|Developer Advisory Team]]</nowiki>

Along my activity within the Ubuntu Development Team, I am particularly careful in sending my work (patches, new packages, etc.) back to Debian. I am firmly convinced that cooperation between Ubuntu and Debian makes both of them stronger and stronger,

I am a member of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it-dev|Ubuntu-it-dev]]</nowiki>. This team is composed by Italian Developers who take care of packaging and backporting software according to the requests coming from our Community. We use the Team PPA as our repository.

* My contributions to Ubuntu: <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AndreaColangelo/Contributions|AndreaColangelo/Contributions]]</nowiki>
* Packages I took care of for Ubuntu: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~warp10/+packages]]</nowiki>. 
* Packages I created for Debian: <nowiki>[[http://qa.debian.org/developer.php?login=warp10@ubuntu.com]]</nowiki>
* Packages I cared of for Ubuntu-it-dev: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it-dev/+archive]]</nowiki>

=== Italian LoCo Team ===

My involvement in the Ubuntu community begun within <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-it.org|Italian LoCo Team]]</nowiki>. Currently I help Italian LoCo Team with three projects:
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/GruppoPromozione/ProgettoRelatori|Progetto Relatori]]</nowiki>: I coordinate a project within Italian Marketing Team to grow and coordinate speakers for conferences and meetings.
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it-dev|Ubuntu-it-dev]]</nowiki>: a team of Italian guys involved in Ubuntu Development or active as prospective Ubuntu developers.
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/NewsletterItaliana|Italian Newsletter]]</nowiki>: I am an author of the official Italian Newsletter.
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu-it/+spec/cd-ubuntu|CD Project]]</nowiki>: we ship Ubuntu CDs to people who neither have a broadband connection nor want to wait for ShipIt CDs.
Also, since January 2012 I am serving a two-years office as a member of the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/Consiglio|Italian LoCo Council]]</nowiki>.

=== Other activities ===

==== Bugs triaging ====

I am a member of Ubuntu Bug Control Team, Bug Squad and Desktop-bugs. I also partecipate to the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~5-a-day|5-a-day]]</nowiki> project.

* Bugs I am currently involved in: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~warp10]]</nowiki>
* Bugs currently assigned to me: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~warp10/+assignedbugs]]</nowiki>

==== Ubuntu Testing Team ====

I am a member of Ubuntu Testing Team. I take care of testing daily builds and report my impressions on <nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/]]</nowiki>

==== Ubuntu/FOSS advocacy ====

Most important of all, I always try to spread the verb of GNU/Linux, FOSS and Ubuntu among friends, relatives and people I meet.

==== Ubuntu Wine and Food Sharing Team ====

I proudly am one of the founders of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-gastro-team|The Official Ubuntu Wine and Food Sharing Team]]</nowiki>. Because we love sharing all around, don't we?
